title: Botanical Garden
description: Lush gardens spread over 55 acres with rare plants and a famous fossil tree trunk.

title: Rose Garden
description: Colorful garden featuring thousands of rose varieties, perfect for a stroll and photo ops.

title: Boat House
description: Enjoy boating on Ooty Lake with pedal boats and rowboats in a tranquil setting.

title: Pykara Lake and Waterfalls
description: Scenic lake and waterfalls ideal for picnics, boating, and nature photography.

title: Avalanche Lake
description: Peaceful lake surrounded by pristine forests, great for camping and trekking.

title: Nilgiri Mountain Railway (Toy Train)
description: Heritage train ride offering stunning views through Nilgiri hills between Ooty and Mettupalayam.

title: Doddabetta Peak
description: The highest peak in the Nilgiris offering panoramic views of the hill station and valleys.

title: St. Stephen's Church
description: Historic Gothic church dating back to the British colonial period.

title: Toda Temple
description: Cultural site representing the Toda tribe, indigenous to the Nilgiri hills.

title: Tea Factory and Tea Museum
description: Tour the tea factory and learn about the Nilgiri tea-making process and history.

title: Dolphin's Nose Viewpoint
description: Breathtaking cliff-side viewpoint overlooking the Catherine Falls and valley.

title: Emerald Lake
description: A calm lake surrounded by rolling hills and tea gardens, perfect for relaxation.

title: Stone House
description: The oldest bungalow in Ooty built in 1822 with colonial architecture.

title: Tiger Hill
description: Popular trekking destination known for sunrise views over the Nilgiris.

title: Sims Park, Coonoor
description: Sim's Park is the venue for the annual vegetable and fruit show.
